text: Bernadette Randall (born 27 September 1965Tennis abstract) is a retired tennis player from Australia. She won the US Girls Doubles with American Ann Hulbert in 1983 ==Junior Grand Slam finals== ===Girls' doubles: 3 (2–1)=== {|class="sortable wikitable" !Result !Year !width=140|Tournament !Surface !width=160|Partner !width=160|Opponents !width=140|Score |- style="background:#b2c8ff;" | bgcolor="FFA07A"|Loss | 1982 | US Open | Hard | Ann Hulbert | Penny Barg Beth Herr | 6–1, 5–7, 6–7 |- style="background:#ffc;" | style="background:#98fb98;"|Win | 1983 | Australian Open | Hard | Kim Staunton | Jenny Byrne Janine Thompson | 6–3, 6–3 |- style="background:#b2c8ff;" | style="background:#98fb98;"|Win | 1983 | US Open | Hard | Ann Hulbert | Natasha Reva Larisa Savchenko | 6–4, 6–2 |} ==Career finals== ===Singles (2–0)=== {|class="sortable wikitable" style=font-size:97% |- !
